GSD.product_version: versions from v4.3 to before v5.18.3
GSD.description:
RDMA/hfi1: Fix potential integer multiplication overflow errors

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.3 by commit ef5ab2e48a5f9960e2352332b7cdb7064bb49032, it was introduced in version v4.3 by commit 7724105686e718ac476a6ad3304fea2fbcfcffde. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: RDMA/hfi1: Fix potential integer multiplication overflow errors
